title.rendered: Anker iPhone Charging Cable, Lightning Cable 1.8 m, Pack of 2 Double-Braided Premium Nylon Lightning Cables, MFi-Certified, for iPhone XS/XS Max/XR/X/8/8 Plus/7/7 Plus/6, iPad and More (Black)

content.rendered:
(*2*)

Certified Compatible

MFi licensed for flawless compatibility with Lightning gadgets, guaranteeing the right cost each time.

Superior Durability

Confirmed by means of rigorous lab testing to face up to as much as 12,000 bends.

Hard-Wearing Exterior

Made with robust, two-shade braided nylon for a cable that lasts longer and seems higher than different cables.

Read more

Premium Nylon Cable

The Durable Sync-and-Charge Cable

Superior Durability

A troublesome nylon exterior resists injury from the skin, whereas the cable’s inside is precision-designed to deal with hundreds upon hundreds of bends.

MFi Certified

The seal of approval from Apple themselves. This premium charging cable is formally verified to work flawlessly along with your iPhone, iPad, and extra.

High-Speed Performance

Guaranteed to cost your gadgets as quick as an unique iPhone charger cable. Forget about worrying whether or not or not your charging cable is squandering precious time.

Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning Premium Nylon A-to-Lightning PowerLine II A-to-Lightning PowerLine III A-to-Lightning PowerLine II USB-C to Lightning Cable New Nylon USB-C to Lightning Cable
Length 6ft [2-Pack] 6ft 6ft 6ft 6ft 6ft
Bend Lifespan 12000+ 12000+ 12000+ 25000+ 12000+ 12000+
Material Nylon braided exterior Nylon braided exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Bulletproof fiber strengthened, TPE exterior Double-braided nylon exterior
Compatibility iPhone, iPad, iPod iPhone, iPad, iPod iPhone, iPad, iPod iPhone, iPad, iPod iPhone, iPad, iPod iPhone, iPad, iPod
MFi Certified ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

The Anker benefit: Become one of over 30 million blissful clients. Charge with Anker.
Extremely sturdy: The high-quality materials and the superior design bestow this cable with unparalleled service life, as much as 5 instances longer than regular.
MFi-certified: Each cable has a particular, examined serial quantity and an Apple-authorised chip, thus guaranteeing full compatibility with any Lightning system.
Strong efficiency: Effortless to make use of, immediate connectivity, in addition to superb compatibility with all Apple gadgets – simply as efficient as precise Apple cables.
What you get: Two premium 180 cm nylon-coated Lightning cables and an instruction guide (English language not assured).
